manifest.name: Task Marker
manifest.description: Change task statuses with hotkeys and context menu. Complete, cancel and mark tasks, as well as cycle among selected task statuses.
manifest.author: wenlzhang

data.manifestValue: Change task statuses with hotkeys and context menu. Complete, cancel and mark tasks, as well as cycle among selected task statuses.
data.communityListValue: Change task status and append text with hotkeys and context menu. Create, complete, cancel and mark tasks, cycle among configured task statuses, and append text (automatically).
